thread.title: Poll: Vote for your favorite N.J. haunted house
thread.title_full: Poll: Vote for your favorite N.J. haunted house

author: Amy Kuperinsky | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Poll: Vote for your favorite N.J. haunted house
text:
Comments 
We asked readers for the best haunted houses around . They delivered, with recommendations of Halloween scares big and small from across the state. 
Now we're asking you to vote on which haunted houses are most worth a visit. Whether it's the scariest, most imaginative or atmospheric, we want to know what haunts get your seal of approval. 
We'll be heading to the five haunted houses or haunted attractions that receive the most votes by noon on Friday, Oct. 9. 
In the meantime, feel free to review our haunted house roundup from 2014. Amy Kuperinsky may be reached at akuperinsky@njadvancemedia.com . Follow her on Twitter @AmyKup . Find NJ.com Entertainment on Facebook .
